ssot__AuthorizationFormDataUse__dlm.name: Authorization Form Data Use
ssot__AuthorizationFormDataUse__dlm.description: The Authorization Form Data Use DMO represents the data uses consented to in an authorization form.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Authorization Form Data Use DMO.

ssot__AuthorizationFormId__c.description: A reference ID to a set of terms and conditions, such as privacy policy, contract, and consent form. This field name includes version numbers and associated references to external documents.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for a system’s logical name that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record originated. For example, the name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DataUsePurposeId__c.description: A reference ID for the reason for contacting a prospect or customer, for example, billing, marketing, or surveys.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.
